name: Yīnsù Fēilóng
summary: Speedy Dragon for the Super A'can

name: Yīn Yuán
summary: In a remote small town of a bygone era, you receive an ‘unexpected’ package while watching a movie—bringing with it an eerie chain of events… As the story unfolds, you begin to realize you may have forgotten the past of your own family, and that your very life might have been borrowed.

name: Yīzìqiānjīn
summary:
The "One Word Treasure Book," passed down for millennia, contains the vast essence of Chinese language and is a vital treasure for Earthlings seeking wisdom and power.

But... the "One Word Treasure Book" suddenly vanished one day.

It turns out... the little monsters responsible for preserving the text in the book have gone off to play in space!
Without the book, Earthlings are gradually losing wisdom and power, weakening... If this continues, Earth will face an unprecedented crisis.
